headline: Affirm Expands Buy Now Pay Later Network With Expedia Bolt And Fiserv
summary: Affirm Holdings (NasdaqGS:AFRM) has entered an exclusive, multi-year partnership with Expedia Group to power buy now, pay later options across major US travel brands. The companies plan to extend the offering to Canada, adding another market for Affirm's installment payment services. This agreement follows recent deals with checkout provider Bolt and financial technology firm Fiserv, widening Affirm's access to e-commerce and banking channels. Affirm focuses on buy now, pay later products...
